privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy | Nursing Conference 2026 | Singapore
privacy_policy.content:
This Privacy Policy outlines how the Nursing Conference 2026, taking place in Singapore on August 2–3, collects, uses, and protects your personal information. We are committed to safeguarding the privacy of all participants, including nurses, midwives, gynecologists, healthcare professionals, and researchers. 

When you register for the conference or visit our official website, we may collect personal data such as your name, contact details, professional affiliation, and payment information. This data is used solely for conference-related communication, registration management, and logistical purposes.

We do not sell or share your information with third parties unless it is essential for delivering conference services or required by law. All personal data is handled in compliance with applicable data protection laws and GDPR regulations.

By accessing our website or registering for the Nursing, Women’s Health, and Gynecology Conference 2026, you agree to this privacy policy. For any questions regarding your data or to request data removal, please contact our organizing team.
privacy_policy.meta_keywords: Privacy Policy, data protection, GDPR compliance, Nursing Conference 2026 privacy, Women’s Health Conference data usage, Gynecology and Midwifery event Singapore, healthcare conference data policy, August 2026 medical conference privacy
